Class ServerView

java.lang.Object
View.ServerView
public class ServerView extends Object
Class name: ServerView Methods list: resultDialog, clientErrorDialog, and getter and setters Constant list: mainBGColor Purpose: ServerView class sets all the GUI for the client using Swing
Since:
JavaSE-17
Version:
03 Dec 2022

Amy Fujimoto
